trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around April 13th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home from work i was traveling on Mcneil rd. and i looked out of my drivers side window and noticed an object fly over my vehicle i saw the back of it their were a total of three lights. On the right side of the craft the light was a bright white the center of the craft had a red light and the far left side also had a bright white light all lights would flash from right to left. The craft appeared to be no higher than 500 feet width was about the size of a foot ball field. I observed the craft traveling at a very low rate of speed with no audible sound. The back of the craft was flat and looked like the bottom side of a triangle completely straight. I have never witnessed any airplane like the one i saw. The color of the craft was black, If possible please have your invistagators look into the radar if you are able to do so please e-mail me the results or direct me to a site where i can research on my own.
Viewing Distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
